briefTitle: Knowledge and Perception of Clinical Trial Participation in Breast Cancer Patients in Egypt
officialTitle: Knowledge and Perception of Clinical Trial Participation in Breast Cancer Female Patients in Egypt, a Cross Sectional Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The percentage of breast cancer patients who accept to participate in clinical trials
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female breast cancer patients

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who refuse participation
